title: How to Make Simple No Bake Banana Lamingtons

steps.headline: Pour water into a saucepan and put on high heat.
Chop and put chocolate into bowl and place over saucepan.
steps.description: This creates a double boiler effect.

steps.headline: Remove from heat.
steps.description: Once the heat melts the chocolate, take the bowl off the saucepan.

steps.headline: Put the desiccated coconut into a separate bowl.
Take the banana and dip into the melted chocolate.
Roll the banana in the desiccated coconut.
Put a stick inside one end of the banana.
Put the banana onto a plate.
Put the plate with bananas into the fridge to set.
Wait until the bananas are cold and hard.
steps.description: Serve to delighted children and the young-at-heart.

text: Pour water into a saucepan and put on high heat.  Chop and put chocolate into bowl and place over saucepan. This creates a double boiler effect. Remove from heat. Once the heat melts the chocolate, take the bowl off the saucepan. Put the desiccated coconut into a separate bowl.  Take the banana and dip into the melted chocolate.  Roll the banana in the desiccated coconut.  Put a stick inside one end of the banana.  Put the banana onto a plate.  Repeat with all other bananas.  Put the plate with bananas into the fridge to set.  Wait until the bananas are cold and hard. Serve to delighted children and the young-at-heart. Finished.
